meanings.definition: Arranged in a whorl or whorls.
meanings.sent1: The verticillate pattern of the petals made the flower look unique.
meanings.sent2: The plant had verticillate branches that grew in a circular arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The verticillate design of the rug gave the room a fun twist.
meanings.sent4: Her verticillate hair spiraled down her back like a cascade of waves.
meanings.sent5: The verticillate arrangement of the stars in the sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A whorl or whorls of leaves or other organs.
meanings.sent1: The verticillate of leaves on the stem created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent2: The verticillate of petals on the flower made it stand out in the garden.
meanings.sent3: He found a caterpillar with a verticillate of legs crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent4: The verticillate of clouds in the sky resembled a fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The verticillate of books on the shelf made it look organized and neat.
